TextView.android:text: Preventive Maintenance Schedule : MONTHLY \n ASMGCS RU type-6
1. Connect the Ethernet cable to LMI port on the Sensor Node and the Ethernet Port on the Laptop.
2. Verify DHCP setting on the Laptop. In the Internet Protocol (TCP/IP) properties windows, Select obtain an IP address automatically.
3. Open Internet Explorer. in the address box enter the following URL address http://192.168.145.126/html/index.html
4. Opening screen of eLCMS application apperars.
Visually inspect the component of the lightning arrestors for any physical Damage.
Inspect antenna RF cables of all RUs and Reftrans and check for any loose connection.
1. Check the performance of UPS batteries by switching off the mains power supply and running the equipment on UPS. Record the back up time of UPS batteries at each site.
